name: Rosewill RXS-3211 IP Camera Password Retriever
author: Ben Schmidt
description:
This module takes advantage of a protocol design issue with the Rosewill admin
        executable in order to retrieve passwords, allowing remote attackers to take
        administrative control over the device.  Other similar IP Cameras such as Edimax,
        Hawking, Zonet, etc, are also believed to have the same flaw, but not fully tested.
        The protocol design issue also allows attackers to reset passwords on the device.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: THREADS
options.description: The number of concurrent threads (max one per host)

options.name: ShowProgress
options.description: Display progress messages during a scan

options.name: ShowProgressPercent
options.description: The interval in percent that progress should be shown
